newsitem.title: USA: Decora Industries says loan pays Cigna debt.
newsitem.headline: Decora Industries says loan pays Cigna debt.

text.p: Decora Industries Inc said Thursday it has completed a $4.354 million senior debt financing with its senior lender, Fleet Bank.
The company said the new financing is comprised of a five year, $3.354 million term loan and a $1 million revolving line of credit facility.

Decora said the proceeds of the term loan were used to repay Cigna Investments the remaining, regularly scheduled payment of $700,000 which had been due on April 15 and early retirement of $1.6 million of the $4.5 due to Cigna on April 15, 1998.
The company said it repaid $2.8 million of the amount due to Cigna in April 1997 in a separate transaction.
The company said it also established an additional $1 million revolving line of credit facility with Fleet to increase export activities in Europe, South America and the Far East.
Decora Industries makes and sells consumer decorative products and specialty industrial products.
